attributes.action: Cancel mock exams for any yr 11 and 13 students
attributes.additional_details: I have wrote to my school and explained my points to why I believe it’s unfair for our school to do these exams, but I would like to make it a Uk wide thing, at the moment all it has done is moved the stress of not doing exams to doing them in school, this is a joke as it’s unfair on these kids stressing them out because they are at a disadvantage, if the students do badly in these exams schools will give them a poor grade when this may not have been the outcome if everything was normal.
attributes.background: I would like to cancel all mock examinations for year 13 and 11 students as this isn’t in the spirit of what Boris Johnson was asking,it’s unfair to judge students on a examination when we have been interrupted to many times throughout the years. This is why our a levels & GCSE have been cancelled.

rejection.details: Deciding whether to hold mock exams is a matter for individual schools, not the Government or House of Commons.
